message: Starting analysis of Weeks 9-10 content. Reading PDF text files for Intelligence and Psychopathology topics.
Successfully read both PDF text files. Now extracting key concepts, theories, and learning objectives from Intelligence and Psychopathology content.
Completed Week 9 (Intelligence) analysis. Now analyzing Week 10 (Psychopathology) content - extracting definitions of abnormality, classification systems (DSM-5, ICD), and major disorder categories.
Extracted anxiety, OCD-related, and mood disorders. Now extracting schizophrenia spectrum and personality disorders - the final major categories for Week 10.
Completed extraction of all key concepts from both weeks. Now creating comprehensive structured summary document in workspace with all findings organized for JSON conversion phase.

Successfully completed analysis of Weeks 9-10. Extracted and documented: (1) Week 9 Intelligence - 5 learning outcomes, 4 theories (Spearman, Cattell, Sternberg, Gardner), 3 testing methods (Stanford-Binet, Wechsler, Raven's), gender/racial differences with biological and environmental explanations, Flynn Effect with 5 causes. (2) Week 10 Psychopathology - 7 definitions of abnormality, DSM-5 classification system, 31 disorders across 5 major categories (anxiety, OCD-related, mood, schizophrenia spectrum, personality). Created comprehensive structured document (weeks_9_10_content_analysis.md) with detailed concepts, theories, diagnostic criteria, examples, historical context, and quiz generation notes. All findings reported via MCP throughout analysis. Document ready for JSON conversion phase.
